price: 120. Alle baa iska leh (Mulkiga, Maamulka iyo) Boqortooyada (runta ah ee) samooyinka iyo arlada iyo waxa gudahooda ah, Allena wax kasta (uu doono) wuu Karaa.
arabic: لِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا فِيهِنَّۚ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرُۢ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: lillahi mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā fīhinna wahuwa ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
